name: Paintings, Please
description:
This game was made for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1.

You work at an Art Museum as an Art Inspector getting paid minimum wage to determine if incoming paintings are real or counterfeit. 

To check if the painting is real, you compare the following:

Description

Date

Serial Number - 8 digit code

Signature - Make sure they match up

Canvas Shape -  Can either be Landscape, Portrait, or Square

Condition - Can either be good Good or Poor. Check back and see if its cracked.

Artist Preferences - EX: If it says that the artist does not draw with the color red and there is red on the painting, the painting is counterfeit.

Press The Green Button If you think the Painting is Real

Press The Red Button If you think the Painting is Fake

Press The Purple Button to Flip the painting.

Credits:

Shannon Sopha: Yellow Drinks the River, Still Life Trillium, and Old Fredrick

Jayden Turcotte: Mr Frog's Forest Adventure, Spidey Man, Bird Cation, and Father

Julian Vidovic: Vengeance and Vincent Van Gogh Self portrait.

Hudson Sopha: Le Fwog

Maysa Sopha: The Lady

Music :https://opengameart.org/content/jazzy-vibes-81-jazz-piano-medley
